title: Record Crowd Expected For Hong Kong's Tiananmen Memorial
teaser: Tens of thousands of people are expected to gather in Hong Kong's Victoria Park to remember the victims of the Tiananmen Square Massacre. Steve Inskeep talks to Chris Buckley of "The New York Times," who's in Hong Kong.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
